TopicTitle: Help: Looking for transfer window planners.

Articles.Content: The other day i found a transfer window mod that is supposed to make things easier. I can't find its name anymore. I know about the mod by TriggerAU, but its not what im looking for.

I don't know of any other transfer window mods other than the one by TriggerAU.  However, there is an online calculator if that's what you're thinking about...  http://ksp.olex.biz/

 

Edited February 17, 2018 by OhioBob
